message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the provided cash flow statement, I can see there's a "Cash and Cash Equivalents" section toward the bottom that explicitly shows:

| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Beginning Balance | 8000000.00 | 2024-02-05 |

This "Beginning Balance" line item represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period, and the value is 8000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'}}
```
